cause.description:
The TKE Educational Foundation is an educational, charitable, tax-exempt organization that is completely independent of the Fraternity. Because of its organization as a 501(c)(3) corporation, the TKE Educational Foundation is able to provide a tax-advantaged means to support scholarship, leadership development, and personal achievement.
Annually, the Foundation awards scholarships to TKE members, grants to Fraternity programs like Regional Leadership Conferences, and funds other leadership programs including the TKE Leadership Academy.
http://www.tke.org/about/tef/
DONORS: Upon completion of your donation on Facebook, please contact the Foundation at 317-872-6533 or rtaflinger@tke.org in order to receive credit toward Beta giving clubs and annual reports. (Facebook donations are anonymous.) THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT OF TAU KAPPA EPSILON FOUNDATION!
cause.mission: To aid men in their mental, moral, and social development for life.
cause.name: Tau Kappa Epsilon Educational Foundation
